name: Blueberry Pancakes
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, whisk mix with egg, milk, 2 tbsp oil, and cinnamon. Fold in blueberries.
  2. Heat 1 tsp oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat. Working in batches and using 1⁄4 cup as a guide, scoop 3–4 pancakes into pan, leaving space between them. Cook until bubbles appear on top and underside is golden brown, about 3 min. Flip each pancake and cook until bottoms are golden brown, about 1–2 min.
  3. Repeat with remaining oil and batter.
tips: Instead of folding blueberries into the batter, make a smiley face out of the berries after scooping batter into the pan: place 2 berries on top of each pancake for eyes and 4–6 berries for a big smile! Be careful, as the pan will be hot; junior chefs will need some help.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 3⁄4 cup plain 2% Greek yogurt and 1⁄2 cup berries.
